title: Communal conflicts in Nigeria: Assessment of the impacts on internally displaced persons and settlements amidst COVID-19 pandemic
content:
Publication date: 15 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 9

Author(s): Christopher M. Anierobi, Cletus Onyema Obasi, Rebecca Ginika Nnamani, Benjamin Okorie Ajah, David O. Iloma, Kingsley O. Efobi, Chinyere Nwaoga, Asadu Ngozi, Uchenna Teresa Okonkwo, Ekwok Innocent Chigbe
